005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
010
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeAdapter;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
013
014import java.io.IOException;
015import java.math.BigInteger;
016
017/**
018 * Provides a common base class for integer-based data types.
019 * <p>
020 * An underlying {@link BigInteger} is used to support arbitrary sized integers.
021 *
022 * @param <ITEM_TYPE>
023 *          the Metapath item type supported by the adapter
024 */
025public abstract class AbstractIntegerAdapter<ITEM_TYPE extends IIntegerItem>
026    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<BigInteger, ITEM_TYPE> {
027
028  /**
029   * Construct a new integer-based adapter.
030   */
031  protected AbstractIntegerAdapter() {
032    super(BigInteger.class);
033  }
034
035  @Override
036  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
037    return JsonFormatTypes.INTEGER;
038  }
039
040  @Override
041  public BigInteger parse(String value) {
042    return new BigInteger(value);
043  }
044
045  @Override
046  public void writeJsonValue(Object value, JsonGenerator generator) throws IOException {
047    try {
048      generator.writeNumber((BigInteger) value);
049    } catch (ClassCastException ex) {
050      throw new IOException(ex);
051    }
052  }
053
054  @Override
055  public BigInteger copy(Object obj) {
056    // a BigInteger is immutable
057    return (BigInteger) obj;
058  }
059}
